name: Unidentified_male_bar_patron_2
content:
This bar patron was a male human who was present in the castle of Maz Kanata on Takodana when the First Order attacked the planet.
This character was portrayed by D.C. Barns in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. Barns had previously won a Star Wars: Force for Change fundraising competition and as a result was given a role in the movie. His role was confirmed in the movie's credits.
